title: [LOVE] Ep. 160 How To Keep Argument Hangovers From Ruining Your Relationship with Jocelyn & Aaron Freeman
description:
What are your beliefs about conflict?

Â 

This week, Ash has not one, but two guests onto the show, Aaron and Jocelyn Freeman, to chat all things in the love category. Aaron and Jocelyn are authors, podcast hosts, and relationship coachâ€™s here to help you keep argument hangovers from ruining your relationship. Tune in to this episode, hear the 5 different Râ€™s to repair conflict in a relationship.Â 

Â 

In any relationship, romantic or platonic, how you communicate matters. Aaron and Jocelyn share different communication styles and personality types and how to navigate them in a relationship.Â Â 

Â 

Lets talk power struggles! Ash dives deep with the guests on how to navigate power within a relationship, the benefits of conflict and how to reflect after an argument. If you find yourself in arguments often, listen in to gain tips on how to reflect after an argument and manage conflict with grace.

Â 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. Gain modern relationship skills.
  2. How to cohabitate and communicate in a healthy way.
  3. The difference between a blip and an important event in a relationship.
  4. 1 single tip to make your conversation feel like less of a battle.

Â 

Where You Can Find Aaron & Jocelyn Freeman:

https://theargumenthangover.com/

IG: @meetthefreemans
